meanings.definition: A heightened state of awareness or consciousness.
meanings.sent1: Her hyperconsciousness of every sound made it difficult for her to fall asleep.
meanings.sent2: His hyperconsciousness of the details in the painting amazed the art critics.
meanings.sent3: The hyperconsciousness of the detective helped solve the mysterious case quickly.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the city, his hyperconsciousness was like a guiding light.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconsciousness of the athlete during the game was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: Excessive awareness or sensitivity to one's surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The patient's hyperconsciousness of germs led to constant hand washing.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperconsciousness of people's emotions made her a great counselor.
meanings.sent3: His hyperconsciousness of the office gossip made him the unofficial news anchor.
meanings.sent4: The hyperconsciousness of the cat made it the best hunter in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconsciousness of the chef for flavors created a unique culinary experience.
